name: openCoDe
short_description: openCoDe is an opensource project aiming at making available to everyone the tools for collective decision making developed by social choice theorist. From voting to student assignment mechanism, our goal is to design user-friendly web app enabeling any collectivity to apply effective decision scheme to its own decision issue. The web app will be developed in PHP/MySQL and distributed under a GNU public licence.
summary: Web applications for collective decision making
